cause.description:
SCNO is a national organization of talented undergraduate business students who are committed to improving their local communities through pro-bono consulting engagements with local non-profit organizations. Our teams provide technological, managerial, and operational consulting; ultimately enabling the non-profit to meet its objectives more effectively.
1. Develop Non-profits
2. Develop our Members
3. Develop the Community
cause.mission: develop non-profits, develop our members and develop the community.
cause.name: SCNO
